title: NBC's Saturday Night Live

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Have the host post an SNL skit in the next day chat
Attributes:
Everyone must comment on the skit at least once or they will be modkilled. The reaction must be comedic or contain laughter. If they don't comply, modkill.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get at least 5 people out of the audience

desc:
Post 2710
*Wait, people actually laugh at this shit?*
